about_the_game:
OVER 3 HOURS of electronic madness, with each track averaging 10mins in length.

Wide range of electronic styles ranging through:
EDM, Hip-hop, House, Dubstep, Drum & Bass, Trap, Electronic, techno, beats, bass, drums, synth, groove, lo-fi, wave, dnb, bpm, reggae, electronica, electro, etc

Get RK3D with this OST from ROUGH KUTS Interactive Films !

Tracks also being rolled out in ROUGH KUTS 3D movie inspired FPS game on Steam.

Loosely inspired by old film titles such as:

💀 Night of the Living Dead 💀 Attack of the Giant Leeches 💀 Dementia 13 💀 The Last Man on Earth 💀 The Brain That Wouldn't Die 💀 House on Haunted Hill 💀 Voodoo Blood Bath 💀 A Bucket of Blood 💀 The Little Shop of Horrors 💀 The Wasp Woman 💀 Monstrosity

💀 The Thirsty Dead 💀 The House of the Dead 💀 Grave of the Vampire 💀 Messiah of Evil 💀 Devil Times Five 💀 The Driller Killer 💀 Silent Night Bloody Night 💀 Invasion of the Bee Girls 💀 Savage Weekend

name: ROUGH KUTS: 3D Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 320kbps MP3 format
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: OVER 3 HOURS OF GNARLY THUMPING ELECTRONIC MUSIC
